ai-tha-ap237:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap237:2.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap237:3.1_0: Even if there is only one eons
ai-tha-ap237:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap237:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vaggumudā.
ai-tha-ap237:6.1_0: a leader of senior mendicant, a sweet, cool water.
